text: John Herbert Norton Fitzpatrick (18 August 1946 - 21 December 2020) was a Scottish footballer. He played as a wing half, forward and full-back for English club Manchester United. He died in December 2020 at the age of 74.UNITED SAD TO HEAR OF FITZPATRICK LOSS == Statistics == Club Season League Cup League Cup Europe OtherIncludes the FA Community Shield, Intercontinental Cup and Anglo-Italian Cup Total Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Manchester United 1964–65 2 0 0 0 — 0 0 — 2 0 1965–66 4 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 5 0 1966–67 3 0 0 0 0 0 — — 3 0 1967–68 17 0 2 0 — 2 0 0 0 21 0 1968–69 30 3 6 1 4 0 0 0 40 4 1969–70 20 3 1 0 5 0 — — 26 3 1970–71 35 2 2 0 6 1 43 3 1971–72 1 0 0 0 0 0 1 0 1972–73 5 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 0 0 6 0 Total 117 8 11 1 12 1 7 0 0 0 147 10 ==Notes== ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Manchester United F.C. players Category:Footballers from Aberdeen
